body.name: CAMILSON Living Room Rugs Modern Luxury 5x7 Vintage Distressed Area Rug Soft Medium Pile Stain Resistant Easy-Cleaning Non-Shedding for Living Room Office Indoor Carpet (5 x 7 / Beige - White)
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
features: HIGH QUALITY WORKMANSHIP AND LUXURY: Experience the high-quality workmanship, comfort and luxury with your loved ones and feel yourself special. Camilson area rugs with their stylish and modern designs are suitable for living room, guest lounge, bedroom, kitchen, children's room, corridor, office and all other living areas. Camilson carpets are soft textured, medium-pile, durable and non-shedding.

CONTEMPORARY DESIGN AND LOVELY COLORS: Spice up your living areas with our stylish and elegant luxury rugs which have original designs and charming colors. Our rugs which are available in a variety of sizes can match any space and decor with their unique, vintage, distressed, abstract and modern patterns.

SOFT, DURABLE AND HIGH QUALITY FIBERS: To make life a little easier, Camilson rugs, produced from 100% first-class soft Polyester and Polypropylene fibers, are non-shedding, easy to clean and provide long-lasting elegance in active homes or areas. Carefully designed indoor area rugs offer stable and secure footing with lasting durability and present you a comfortable living space.

EASY TO CLEAN AND PET FRIENDLY: You don't need to be afraid of the stains your pets and children will leave on your rugs. Our rugs, which are made of durable Polyester and Polypropylene yarns and have a solid, machine-woven structure, can be vacuumed with a vacuum cleaner or cleaned by wiping them with a slightly damp cloth using carpet cleaning shampoo.

CAMILSON RUGS: CAMILSON offers excellent products and a wonderful buying experience. Our primary and fundamental goal is to increase your satisfaction and earn your trust by presenting you our high-quality rugs we produce with the experience that we have gained from our long-standing carpet production journey. Our rugs are produced in Turkey and offered to your use.

Bedroom Rug Carefully designed, non-shedding, medium pile indoor area rugs present you comfortable, aesthetic and exclusive bedroom. Dining Room Rug Exclusive CAMILSON rugs, which make you feel the aesthetics and quality in every aspect, can be combined with all kinds of furniture.

Easy to Clean CAMILSON Pastoral Series rugs can be vacuumed with a vacuum cleaner or cleaned by wiping them with a slightly damp cloth using carpet cleaning shampoo. Pet Friendly Carefully designed CAMILSON indoor area rugs offer lasting durability and present you and your pets a safe and comfortable living space. Lovely Colors and Long Lasting Quality To make life a little easier, CAMILSON rugs, produced from 100% first-class soft Polyester and Polypropylene fibers, provide long-lasting elegance and comfort in active homes or areas. Stain-Resistant and Dust-Relesae Since it is produced from high quality Polyester and Polypropylene fibers and has a medium pile structure, it does not accumulate dirt and dust.

Experience comfort, aesthetics and quality with exclusive Camilson Rugs We are determined to bring excellent patterns and lovely colors that time cannot touch under your feet to give you a unique experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful rug with detailed texture
reviews.reviewText: What a beautiful rug! I was looking for an office rug that would help brighten up my dark office and this is exactly it!Pros:1. light color to brighten up an area2. detailed texture on the rug to add more interest than just the varied colors of beige; also helps elevate the space3. Finnished edge of the rug so it looks put togetherCons:1. The back of the rug does not have a grip so if it is on a hard surface you may need a rug gripping mat underneath so it does not slide around2. The rug i received had less color variation than the image of the stock photo which resulted in my rug being very light in color and not much tan or grey variation; which I would have preferred to minimize stains and scuffs.Overall-this is such a beautiful rug that really helps elevate a space with its detailed texture and color combination. So happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing look and texture
reviews.reviewText: My favorite rug so far. It's got a very unique texture (thin ripples in the fabric) and it's still very soft and pleasing. I love that it is such a neutral rug for my space as the other one I had before was too busy and clashed with my decor. This one adds an elegant and yet simple touch to my farmhouse decor. I absolutely love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The 8 × 10 rug is nice, goes with my living room, feels soft underfoot, with a silk rug appearance. It is thin though and looks cheaper than I thought it might, especially for the cost? Maybe that is just me. It did not help that it was delivered with the plastic split down one end, with a dirty area about 7" x 15" exposed!I think the seller/manufacturer should have wrapped it better. Of course, I called Amazon, suggesting I can keep it, if they would refund some $. They did about 20% off. It mostly cleaned up okay. Sorry I am not allowing Amazon to access my photos so cannot post a picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars soft modern rug that doesn't shed
reviews.reviewText: I've been looking for a neutral gray and white rug to compliment my kids' room. This rug was the perfect size and style. The rug itself is soft, has some texture so it feels good barefoot, and most importantly, does not shed. The one drawback (which you'll find in many rugs not just this one) is that the back lacks any "grip". As a result, the rug slides around a bit when placed over a smooth surface like hardwood. I'd recommend getting a rug underlayment to keep the rug in place and to provide extra cushioning underneath.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My huskies love it
reviews.reviewText: When I put this rug down my huskies fell in love. They lay on this rug and have not chewed on it. My large dog likes to run and slide on this rug as a game. I can tell you this rug is still in great condition. I am very happy and it looks great. Price is fair due to how well it is made and how it stands up to husky abuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice rug
reviews.reviewText: This rug is really great quality. It came with zero wrinkles and laid completely flat right away. It’s really soft and I love the look of it. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We are in love with this rug! Excellent price and quality. We will be put it in our living room
